1.title: Remembering
1.plot: Gary Todd tells a tale of one of his exploits.

1.title: EOSEpisodeOne-ThePatientsArrive
1.plot: In Episode One the patients are introduced.

2.title: EOSEpisodeTwo-MeetTheStaff
2.plot: In Episode Two we meet the staff members of Brookvale Mental Hospital.

3.title: EOSEpisodeThree-Ain'tMisbehavin'
3.plot: Both patients and staff are misbehaving.

4.title: EOSEpisodeFour-FindingFriends
4.plot: It is important to make friends here at Brookvale. Some are having an easier time of it than others. Some are looking for someone to trust, some are looking for love, while others are a bit lonely and shy.

5.title: EOSEpisodeFive-FoodForThought
5.plot: Published on Sep 28, 2013 There is a food shortage at Brookvale. It is being used for control and manipulation of both patients and staff.

6.title: EOSEpisodeSix-MedicationMayhem
6.plot: Medications are getting mixed up, and doubled. Patients and staff are acting more odd than usual. Does this have anything to do with Dr. Simon Neil?

7.title: EOSEpisodeSeven-LetMeOutOfHere
7.plot: Some patients have returned to Brookvale. Chaos is still going on. There are rumors of bars being put on windows to prevent patients from jumping out.

9.title: EOSEpisodeNine-LetMeEntertainYou
9.plot: Nurse Gertrude and Dr. Damian Thorne have both reached breaking points. Who or what could have caused this? At least it explains Dr. Damian Thorne's absence. On a brighter note, Brookvale Mental Hospital is having a talent show. Are we having fun yet?

10.title: EOSEpisodeTen-HappyHalloween
10.plot: Chaos still ensues at Brookvale with staff being admitted as well. Annette likes her medications, Raven has a problem, and Frankie seems to be getting worse. The Halloween Party was a success but Raven is scared by a cupcake.

imdb.plot outline: Brookvale Mental Hospital is an old facility set in a remote area in West Virginia, USA. They still implement 70's style mental health care and are lacking funds to meet strict up-to-date qualifications to run their facility due to the Head Administrator's greed. They continue to hire staff and take patients with only a few knowing the truth. The staff seem to have everything under control but they don't. Their flaws, quirks, weaknesses start to show. The patients who are clinically diagnosed with certain mental illnesses seem at times to be saner than the staff. Will Dr. Nathan Wallace single handedly take over the greedy Head Administrator's job? Will Dr. Nathan Wallace win support from staff and patients? Will Samuel Stevens then take over Dr. Nathan Wallace's job after he comes to the good side after Margo Gyllenhal's coaxing? Or will Samuel Stevens continue supporting the Head Administrator and portray a good doctor all the while deceiving patients? Will the Head Administrator change his ways with the encouragement from Nurse Gertrude? There is alot of history between the Head Administrator and Nurse Gertrude. On one hand, she still loves him and tries to support him but cannot hurt patients. Occasionally he checks on her to see if she is loyal to him. Is she loyal to him or to the patients? She goes back and forth. She is confused. Who will she eventually side with?
imdb.title: The Edge of Sanity
